sources.title: Decision: Liquidation | SPY MOVIE
sources.description:
Action film about a special operation to eliminate the terrorist Shamil Basayev. The film is based on actual events and touches on one of the most horrific pages of the recent past of the Russian Federation. As a result of a highly complex operation of the special services, terrorist leader Shamil Basayev was killed. It was him who became the prototype of the main negative character in the movie, Shamil Bazgayev. 

Shamil Basayev is responsible for heinous acts of terrorism: 
- The Budennovsk attack (1995)
- The kidnapping of Doctors Without Borders worker in Chechnya (2001) 
- Nord-Ost siege (2002)
- Suicide bombing of the Chechen government headquarters (2002)
- Series of suicide bombings (2003)
- Bombing of gas pipelines and power transmission lines in the Moscow region (2004)
- Terrorist attack in Grozny on May 9, 2004
- Terrorist attacks in Moscow (2004)
- Airplane Explosions (2004)
- The Beslan school siege (2004)
- Power system breakdown in Moscow
- Arson at the Stanislavsky and Nemirovich-Danchenko Theater (2005)

The script of Decision: Liquidation was based on the memories of the direct participants of the FSB operation. 

Year of production: 2018

Directed by: Alexandr Aravin
Written by: Alexey Buzin, Pavel Kosov, Pavel Pavlov
Director of photography:
Music: Yuri Poteyenko
Production designer: Alik Tagirov
Starring: Igor Petrenko, Alexey Vertkov, Ayub Tsingiev, Dmitry Parastayev, Alexey Shevchenkov, Ivan Shakhnazarov
